stories.text: I'm working on writing a new document to determine how to categorize bugs for my company, and I was wondering how you categorize bugs at your place of work, from minor to major.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you classify bugs in your company?
HTTP API and Solana oracle for weed prices
Coded Hate Speech in Online Memetics
The next giant leap: why Boris Johnson wants to ‘go big’ on quantum computing

stories.text:
I like using text files. I also like using shell script to automate most of the things I do. When using an iPhone I couldn't do most of these things. So I created a web application that would allow me to do just that. Basically it evaluates `!command` and ```! multi line code block ``` in place.

Honestly it is quite in the early stages but would like your feedback on it. Here is the GitHub page: https://github.com/satran/dabba
stories.title: Show HN: I built a note taking application that can run shell scripts
